DOC.brief_summary: This retrospective data-only study follow phased introduction HEM-AVERT® Perianal Stabilizer routine clinical practice . The investigator aim capitalize introduction HEM-AVERT® Perianal Stabilizer routine clinical practice labor delivery setting hospital Dignity Health - St. Rose , Siena Campus determine whether HEM-AVERT® Perianal Stabilizer reduce frequency Cesarean Section labor delivery .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Hem-Avert® Perianal Stabilizer Into Routine Clinical Practice
DOC.detailed_description: The label device study HEM-AVERT® Perianal Stabilizer manufacture Stetrix , Inc . This study sponsor Dignity Health fall within guideline set forth Food Drug Administration 21 CFR Section 812.2 non-significant risk study . The HEM-AVERT® Perianal Stabilizer Class II device accordance FDA regulation 21 CFR 801.109 . Retrospective data collect study reduction c-section rate duration second stage labor . These data may use support application FDA new indication reduce c-section . It also possible second stage labor data may also use support expand labeling .
